Name: Get-GroupPolicy
Description: One liner to capture a GPResult report and open it

Name: Search-ChildItem
Description: Like Get-ChildItem –Recurse but quietly skips “Access denied” paths; lets you cap recursion depth;* returns only LastWriteTime and FullName

Name: cd
Description: Enabled changing directory to shortcut path

Name: findstr
Description: Automatically applies /I to findstr.exe making it case insensitive

Name: md5sum
Description: So you don't have to Get-FileHash -Algorithm
